changeSet.author: Adarsh
changeSet.sql: Set search_path = plf,public,pg_catalog;

changeSet.author: vijaya.a
changeSet.sql: UPDATE RBFIELDDETAILS SET MODULECODE = 'CustomerCategory', RBFLDDESC = 'Customer Category' WHERE RBFLDDESC = 'Customer Catery' AND RBFLDNAME = 'ct_custCtgCode' AND RBMODULE = 'LTVRULE';

changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE = 'Y' WHERE SYSPARMCODE = 'MANDATE_ALW_PARTNER_BANK';

changeSet.author: gopal.p
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE = 'Y' WHERE SYSPARMCODE = 'ALLOW_MANUAL_ADV_DUE_CREATION';

vijaya.a
vijaya.a
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE PROMOTIONS DROP CONSTRAINT uk_promotions; ALTER TABLE PROMOTIONS_TEMP DROP CONSTRAINT uk_promotions_temp;

changeSet.author: vijaya.a
changeSet.sql: Delete from RBFIELDDETAILS where RBMODULE = 'FEES' and RBEVENT = 'ADDDBSP' and RBFLDNAME = 'fm_finBranchProvinceCode'; Insert into RBFIELDDETAILS (RBMODULE,RBEVENT,RBFLDNAME,RBFLDDESC,RBFLDTYPE,RBFLDLEN,RBFORCALFLDS,RBFORBLDFLDS,RBFLDTABLENAME,RBSTFLDS,MODULECODE) values ('FEES', 'ADDDBSP', 'fm_finBranchProvinceCode', 'Branch Province Code', 'nvarchar', 8, '0', '1', 'RMTCountryVsProvince', 'dbvalue', 'Province');

changeSet.author: praveena
changeSet.sql: update DATA_ENGINE_COLUMN set ruleforvalue ='if((ACTUALRATE == '''')){Result = 0; return;}else {Result = ACTUALRATE; return;}' where name='ACTUALRATE' and tableid in (select id from data_engine_table where configid in (select id from data_engine_config where name = 'RATE_CHANGE_UPLOAD'));

changeSet.author: praveena.v
changeSet.sql: update reportfilterfields set FIELDDBNAME='P.PostDate' where reportid in (select reportid from reportconfiguration where menuitemcode='menu_Item_LoanwiseVoucherDetail') AND FIELDID = 1;

changeSet.author: praveena.v
changeSet.sql: update reportfilterfields set FIELDDBNAME='P.FinBranch' where reportid in (select reportid from reportconfiguration where menuitemcode='menu_Item_LoanwiseVoucherDetail') AND FIELDID = 3;

changeSet.author: praveena.v
changeSet.sql: update reportfilterfields set FIELDDBNAME='P.FinIsActive' where reportid in (select reportid from reportconfiguration where menuitemcode='menu_Item_LoanwiseVoucherDetail') AND FIELDID = 4;

changeSet.author: praveena.v
changeSet.sql: update reportfilterfields set FIELDDBNAME='P.fintype' where reportid in (select reportid from reportconfiguration where menuitemcode='menu_Item_LoanwiseVoucherDetail') AND FIELDID = 5;

changeSet.author: Gopal.p
Gopal.p
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE = '0' WHERE SYSPARMCODE = 'NUMBEROF_UNDATED_CHEQUES';

changeSet.author: Gopal.p
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE = 'N' WHERE SYSPARMCODE = 'EOM_ON_EOD';

changeSet.author: Gopal.p
changeSet.sql: UPDATE JOB_DETAILS SET ENABLED = 1 WHERE JOBKEY = 'USER_AUTO_LOCKING_JOB';

changeSet.author: saikiran.n
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE ='240' WHERE SYSPARMCODE ='BANK_CODE';

changeSet.author: saikrishna.b
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM RULES WHERE RULEMODULE = 'LMTLINE';

changeSet.author: saikrishna.b
gopal.p
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DUE_EXTRACTION_HEADER SET RECORDSTATUS = 'Approved'; UPDATE DUE_EXTRACTION_CONFIG SET RECORDSTATUS = 'Approved';

changeSet.author: gopal.p
gopal.p
gopal.p
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE = 'PRESENTMENT_REQUEST' WHERE SYSPARMCODE LIKE 'PRESENTMENT_REQUEST_PDC';

changeSet.author: saikrishna.b
saikrishna.b
Gopal.p
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE = 'Y' WHERE SYSPARMCODE = 'ALLOW_DIVISION_BASED_CLUSTER'; UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE = 'Y' WHERE SYSPARMCODE ='ALLOW_ORGANISATIONAL_STRUCTURE';

changeSet.author: saikiran.n
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DATA_ENGINE_CONFIG SET UPLOADPATH = '/opt/PFF/BASE/mandates/request' WHERE NAME = 'MANDATES_EXPORT';

changeSet.author: saikiran.n
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DATA_ENGINE_CONFIG SET UPLOADPATH = '/opt/PFF/BASE/presentment/request' WHERE NAME = 'PRESENTMENT_REQUEST'; UPDATE DATA_ENGINE_CONFIG SET UPLOADPATH = '/opt/PFF/BASE/presentment/response' WHERE NAME = 'PRESENTMENT_RESPONSE';

changeSet.author: saikrishna.b
changeSet.sql:
DELETE FROM RMTLOVFIELDDETAIL WHERE FIELDCODE = 'MANDATE_HOLD_REASON';
INSERT INTO RMTLOVFIELDDETAIL(FIELDCODEID, FIELDCODE, FIELDCODEVALUE, VALUEDESC, ISACTIVE, VERSION, LASTMNTBY, LASTMNTON, RECORDSTATUS, ROLECODE, NEXTROLECODE, TASKID, NEXTTASKID, RECORDTYPE, WORKFLOWID, SYSTEMDEFAULT)values ((Select max(FieldCodeId)+1 from RMTLOVFIELDDETAIL_VIEW), 'MANDATE_HOLD_REASON', 'CONSECUTIVE BOUNCE', 'CONSECUTIVE BOUNCE', 1, 1, 1000, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'Approved', null, null, null, null, null, 0, 1);

changeSet.author: saikiran.n
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DATA_ENGINE_CONFIG SET FILEEXTENSION ='.xls' WHERE NAME ='MANDATES_IMPORT';

changeSet.author: saikiran.n
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DATA_ENGINE_CONFIG SET FILEEXTENSION ='.xls' WHERE NAME ='PRESENTMENT_RESPONSE';

changeSet.author: goutham.ch
saikiran.n
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DATA_ENGINE_COLUMN SET CONSTRAINTTYPE = 'M' WHERE NAME = 'MANDATE_REG_NO' AND TABLEID = (SELECT ID FROM DATA_ENGINE_TABLE WHERE CONFIGID = (SELECT ID FROM DATA_ENGINE_CONFIG WHERE NAME = 'MANDATES_IMPORT'));

changeSet.author: goutham.ch
goutham.ch
goutham.ch
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO JOB_DETAILS (ID, JOBKEY, DESCRIPTION, JOBTRIGGER, CRON_EXPRESSION, JOBMODE, STATUS, ENABLED, FAILURE_NOTIFICATION_REQ, HOST_NAME, PORT, JMX_PORT, SMTP_SERVER, NOTIFY_EMAILS, EXECUTION_LOG_REQ, EXECUTION_RETENTION_DAYS, VERSION, LASTMNTBY, LASTMNTON, RECORDSTATUS, ROLECODE, NEXTROLECODE, TASKID, NEXTTASKID, RECORDTYPE, WORKFLOWID, MONITORING_REQ) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(ID)+1 FROM JOB_DETAILS), 'EXT_PRMNT_STAGE_PROCESSOR_JOB', 'Reading External PDC response.', 'EXT_PRMNT_STAGE_PROCESSOR_JOB_TRIGGER', '0 0/3 * 1/1 * ? *', 1, 0, 1, 0, NULL, 0, 0, NULL, NULL, 1, 0, 0, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 1);

changeSet.author: goutham.ch
goutham.ch
goutham.ch
saikrishna.b
changeSet.sql: UPDATE JOB_DETAILS SET CRON_EXPRESSION = '0 0 0/1 1/1 * ? *' WHERE JOBKEY = 'USER_AUTO_LOCKING_JOB';

changeSet.author: Gopal.p
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE = 'N' WHERE SYSPARMCODE = 'RECEIPTS_SHOW_ACCOUNTING_TAB';

changeSet.author: Gopal.p
changeSet.sql: UPDATE JOB_DETAILS SET ENABLED = 0 WHERE JOBKEY IN ('SI_LIEN_MARKING_JOB', 'SI_LIEN_FILE_WRITING_JOB', 'SI_LIEN_RESPONSE_JOB');

changeSet.author: SaiKrian.n
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DATA_ENGINE_COLUMN SET CONSTRAINTTYPE = 'O' WHERE TABLEID IN (SELECT ID FROM DATA_ENGINE_TABLE WHERE CONFIGID IN(SELECT ID FROM DATA_ENGINE_CONFIG WHERE NAME = 'MANDATES_IMPORT')) AND NAME = 'REMARKS';
